name: Connect Up
description:
DESCRIPTION

Connect Up is a game made for Ryan Laley Games Spring Jam 2023, of which the team was "Connections".

The game takes place in a small park, on a rainy day. Humans come here hoping to meet their soulmates, with shared interests as theirs. Your job is to make sure that everything goes smoothly!

The game explores the theme of "connections" in several ways. First, players must make connections between humans to advance in the game. Second, the game encourages players to find connections between people based on their interests. Finally, the game promotes the idea that making connections can be beneficial for both individuals and the community as a whole.

CONTROLS

Use your mouse to select and move humans around.
